lmek001.name: Iron Striker
lmek001.description: A durable frontline skirmisher, designed to withstand heavy fire while delivering precise counterattacks.

lmek002.name: Shadow Phantom
lmek002.description: A nimble infiltrator, utilizing high mobility and evasive tactics to strike from the shadows and disappear.

lmek003.name: Specter Shadow
lmek003.description: A stealth-oriented combat unit with enhanced shielding, excelling in rapid ambushes and energy-based assaults.

lmek004.name: Storm Dancer
lmek004.description: A lightning-fast skirmisher designed for hit-and-run tactics.

lmek005.name: Blitz Warden
lmek005.description: A rapid assault unit with reinforced kinetic shielding for fast engagements.

lmek006.name: Striker Talon
lmek006.description: A high-mobility scout mech equipped with precision strike capabilities.

lmek007.name: Falcon Edge
lmek007.description: A lightweight recon unit with superior speed and evasion capabilities.

lmek008.name: Viper Stride
lmek008.description: An aggressive interceptor equipped with reactive plating and short-range weaponry.

lmek009.name: Ghost Mirage
lmek009.description: A stealthy hunter capable of slipping past enemy defenses unnoticed.

lmek010.name: Raptor Fang
lmek010.description: A fast-moving combat unit specialized in precision flanking maneuvers.
